text.section:
An operator of a vehicle or vessel who gets motor fuel for transport from a marine terminal, pipeline tank farm, place of manufacture, refinery, or other type of bulk storage shall:
have a copy of the loading ticket or manifest; and
deliver a copy of the loading ticket or manifest to the buyer or consignee of the motor fuel at the time of delivery.
A loading ticket or manifest shall accompany each conveyance that leaves a place of loading.
